hero.title: Cyrus Programming Language
hero.subtitle: A programming language engineered for simplicity, performance, and easy migration, minimizing maintenance costs and maximizing developer joy

sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
sponsors.subtitle: We deeply appreciate the valuable support of our sponsors. Their partnership empowers us to deliver a better experience for our users and continue our journey of growth and innovation. Having you by our side inspires us to build a brighter future.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Cyrus combines the best aspects of modern programming languages with innovative features designed for today's development challenges.

cleanSyntax.title: Clean and Readable Syntax
cleanSyntax.description: Designed with readability in mind, Cyrus's syntax is intuitive and reduces cognitive load.

typeSystem.title: Strong Type System
typeSystem.description: Catch errors at compile time with a powerful type system that provides safety without verbosity.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform Compatibility
crossPlatform.description: Write once, run anywhere. Cyrus works seamlessly across all major operating systems.

concurrency.title: Built-in Concurrency
concurrency.description: First-class support for concurrent and parallel programming with intuitive primitives.

standardLibrary.title: Extensive Standard Library
standardLibrary.description: A rich, well-documented standard library that covers most common programming needs.

openSource.title: Open-source & Community-driven
openSource.description: Developed in the open with contributions from developers around the world.

examples.title: Elegant by Design
examples.subtitle: Cyrus's syntax is designed to be intuitive, expressive, and easy to read.

why.title: Ancient Wisdom, Modern Power
why.paragraph1: Cyrus combines timeless engineering principles with cutting-edge compiler technology to create a language that is both intuitive and powerfully efficient.
why.paragraph2: In a crowded landscape of programming languages, Cyrus stands out by offering a carefully balanced blend of simplicity and control. It is designed for developers who value both productivity and raw performance, without forcing compromises. Its clean, expressive syntax lowers the barrier to entry, while its high-performance compiler ensures your programs run with predictable efficiency.
why.paragraph3: Cyrus is built on a philosophy of minimalism and predictable abstraction. It provides deterministic low-level control and a transparent execution model, giving developers the confidence to write robust, efficient code without hidden runtime mechanisms. Whether you are prototyping a new idea or building high-performance systems, Cyrus ensures your code remains fast, clear, and maintainable. With support for modern programming paradigms, a straightforward module system, and an unwavering focus on simplicity, Cyrus empowers developers for everything from small scripts to complex, large-scale software.

Footer.description: A modern programming language designed for simplicity, performance, and developer happiness.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.welcome: Welcome to the official documentation for Cyrus. Here you'll find everything you need to get started with our modern, expressive, and efficient programming language.

errorAlert.title: Under Development
errorAlert.content: Consider that Cyrus is under heavy development and is not stable yet. Therefore, it is not recommended for production environments or critical applications where stability and long-term support are paramount. Users should anticipate frequent updates, breaking changes, and potential bugs as the project evolves.
